L

loadInteractablePreset(String) - Static method in class game.PresetLoader
This method parses for all of the attributes of an InteractablePreset and makes one based on a string that is a jsonObject.
loadNpcPreset(String) - Static method in class game.PresetLoader
This method loads in an NPCPreset from a string that is a JSONObject, including all of its attributes and whatever it has in its inventory.
loadRoomPresets(String) - Static method in class game.PresetLoader
This method takes a json file with an object that has one attribute, "rooms", that is an array of rooms, and uses other methods in the class to load in an array of RoomPresets.
